name: Paiwt Founder's Token
description:
Golden Pirate Ernie - Paiwt Founder's Token.
After being forced to "Walk The Plank", Enjin Ernest, "Paiwt Hand", commonly known as "Ernie", taking on the role of a Pirate, is now recovering his buried treasures.
As the holder of this token, you will receive perpetual rewards from Pirate Ernies Treasures.

properties.Tournament Ability: "Walk The Plank"- Place all current cards in your hand face up onto the discard pile, then draw an equal amount of cards from the face down draw pile.
properties.Treasures: Paiwt Token Airdrops and 10% Off All Paiwt Orders,
